meanings.definition: Chemical substances in the body that affect the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: The neurohumors play a vital role in how our nerves work.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are researching the effects of different neurohumors on brain function.
meanings.sent3: The neurohumors in my body must be having a party, making me feel so happy!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter spread through the room like joyful neurohumors.
meanings.sent5: Imagine tiny neurohumors running around your body, delivering messages to your brain!

meanings.definition: The study of the chemical messengers in the brain.
meanings.sent1: Neurohumors research helps us understand how our brains communicate.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use advanced technology to study neurohumors in the brain.
meanings.sent3: I find neurohumors fascinating to learn about in my science class.
meanings.sent4: The secrets of the brain are unlocked through the study of neurohumors.
meanings.sent5: In the lab, researchers observe the intricate dance of neurohumors under the microscope.

meanings.definition: A substance that influences mood and behavior.
meanings.sent1: Certain foods can act as neurohumors, affecting how we feel.
meanings.sent2: The neurohumors released during exercise can boost our mood.
meanings.sent3: I jokingly blame the neurohumors for my sudden burst of energy!
meanings.sent4: His words acted like neurohumors, changing the atmosphere in the room.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fresh flowers filled the air, acting as calming neurohumors on a stressful day.
